channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Former Top Biden Advisor To Attend Lai Inauguration
item.description: The U.S.'s de facto embassy in Taiwan says a bipartisan delegation led by a former Biden advisor will attend President-elect Lai Ching-te's inauguration on May 20th. Analysts say t

item.title: Cabinet Resigns Ahead of Lai's Inauguration
item.description: Premier Chen Chien-jen has stepped down along with his Cabinet to begin the standard caretaker period before the new Lai Ching-te administration takes over on May 20.

item.title: NGOs Criticize Outgoing President Tsai Ing-wen's Social Housing Policy
item.description: Housing equity NGOs say outgoing President Tsai Ing-wen's social housing policies didn't achieve all they had hoped.

item.title: Taiwan's President Breaks Ground on New Shipbuilding Facility in Kaohsiung
item.description: Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen attended the groundbreaking ceremony of a new ship research facility in Kaohsiung.
